name: Future Signals Operation
description: This is the final stage of your GCIA training. The raw climate dataset contains missing values, inconsistent signals, and untold patterns. Your task is to prepare the data, engineer meaningful features, and visualize key country-level trajectories. These steps lay the foundation for predictive models that will forecast the planetâ€™s future. The quality of your preprocessing and the clarity of your visuals will determine how well the next generation of analysts can act on the signals you uncover.
